p: Weaver also reported on ZIKV vaccine strains that were attenuated through deletions in the 3â€²UTR. As a DNA-launched ZIKV live-attenuated vaccine, having a 20-nucleotide deletion, this mutant virus gave rise to high antibody titers after a single immunization and was highly protective in a ZIKV mouse model, as well as, in a rhesus macaque infection model ( Zou et al., 2018).
